Evaluation of short-read sequencing performance across the Mtb genome

View on GitHub

This website is related to the repository of for Genomic sequence characteristics and the empiric accuracy of short-read sequencing, 2021, BioRxiv.

Results

Useful Genome-wide statistics and visualizations (across H37Rv, the Mtb reference genome)

From this work we present many useful results that can help guide future genomics studies of the Mtb genome using Illumina WGS.

Full Screen Browser

Genome Masking Schemes

1) Refined Low Confidence (RLC) Regions (RLC_Regions.H37Rv.bed)

2) Low Pileup Mappability Regions (K=50bp, E=4 mismatches, 201027_PMap_K50E4_Regions_BELOW_1.bed)

3) RLC Regions & Low Pileup Mappability Regions combined (RLC_Regions.Plus.LowPmapK50E4.H37Rv.bed)

mtb-illumina-wgs-evaluation is maintained by farhat-lab. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
